_aChangeLog.text: Total improvement of comlete Navigation Mesh

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_DISTRICT23

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: March 17 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for nice designed night'n'rainy urban-themed map de_district23 by Simon Brain / bauer901 (released June 2010). It's a completely hand-made and carefully optimized .nav-file (because in original author's release the .nav-file probably was simple auto-gen).

This Navigation Mesh was created from scratch approximately for 60% and the most part of the areas was recustomized manually because in auto-generated Navigation Mesh some pathways and areas were constructed incorrectly (including most of stairways) or were missed (for example the path through a ventilating course).

Well... bots freely move through all walkable areas of the map now. I hope their improved behavior on this beautiful map will give you pleasure ;-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator embedded in .bsp-file and available to downloading with the same map.

Play and Enjoy! Also you aren't lazy to report about your impressions and possible remarks :-)

Credits and Gratitudes: Simon Brain (for this fascinating and modern styled map).

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Play the game... all night long! :-)
